words.source: H559 (אמר), HC/Vqw1cs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-1cs). KJV 'And I have said', ESV 'and I promise', NASB 'So I said'.
H5927 (עלה), HVhi1cs (Hiphil-imperfect-1cs). KJV 'I will bring you up', ESV 'I will bring you up', NASB 'I will bring you up'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo/Sp2mp (direct object marker/suffix-2mp). KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'.
H6040 (עֳנִי), HR/Ncmsc (preposition-min/noun-common-ms-construct). KJV 'out of the affliction of', ESV 'out of the affliction of', NASB 'from the affliction of'.
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Egypt'.
H776 (אֶרֶץ), HNcbsc (noun-common-both-singular-construct). KJV 'the land of', ESV 'the land of', NASB 'the land of'.
H3669 (כְּנַעֲנִי), HTd/Ngmsa (article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'the Canaanites'.
H2850 (חִתִּי), HC/Td/Ngmsa (conjunctive/article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and the Hittites'.
H567 (אֱמֹרִי), HC/Td/Ngmsa (conjunctive/article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and the Amorites'.
H6522 (פְּרִזִּי), HC/Td/Ngmsa (conjunctive/article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and the Perizzites'.
H2340 (חִוִּי), HC/Td/Ngmsa (conjunctive/article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and the Hivites'.
H2983 (יְבוּסִי), HC/Td/Ngmsa (conjunctive/article/gentilic-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and the Jebusites'.
H776 (אֶרֶץ), HNcbsa (noun-common-both-singular-absolute). KJV 'a land', ESV 'a land', NASB 'a land'.
H2100 (זוב), HVqrfsc (Qal-participle-fs-construct). KJV 'flowing with', ESV 'flowing with', NASB 'flowing with'. All agree.
H2461 (חָלָב), HNcmsa (noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'milk'.
H1706 (דְּבַשׁ), HC/Ncmsa (conjunctive/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and honey'.
